TOOLTIP.EMAIL: Email should be a valid email address like name@example.com.
TOOLTIP.USER_NAME: Cannot contain special characters and maximum length should be 20 characters.
TOOLTIP.COMMENT: Length of comment should be less than 20 characters.
TOOLTIP.PASSWORD: Password should be at least 8 characters with at least 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number.
TOOLTIP.SIGN_UP_MAIL: Email is only used for resetting your password.
TOOLTIP.NUMBER_REQUIRED: Field is required and should be numbers.
TOOLTIP.PORT_REQUIRED: Field is required and should be valid port number.

CHANGE_PWD.TITLE: Change Password
CHANGE_PWD.PASS_TIPS: At least 8 characters with 1 uppercase, 1 lowercase and 1 number

PROJECT.FAILED_TO_DELETE_PROJECT: Project contains repositories or replication rules cannot be deleted.
PROJECT.INLINE_HELP_PUBLIC: When a project is set to public, anyone has read permission to the repositories under this project, and the user does not need to run "docker login" before pulling images under this project.

REPLICATION.DELETION_SUMMARY: Do you want to delete rule {{param}}?

REPLICATION.NAME: Name
REPLICATION.CONFIRM_TOGGLE_ENABLE_POLICY:
After enabling the replication rule, all repositories under the project will be replicated to the destination registry. 
Please confirm to continue.
REPLICATION.CONFIRM_TOGGLE_DISABLE_POLICY:
After disabling the rule, all unfinished replication jobs of this rule will be stopped and canceled. 
Please confirm to continue.
REPLICATION.CANNOT_EDIT: Replication rule cannot be changed while it is enabled.
REPLICATION.FAILED_TO_DELETE_POLICY_ENABLED: Cannot delete rule: rule has unfinished job(s) or rule is enabled.
REPLICATION.FOUND_ERROR_IN_JOBS: Found errors in the replication job(s), please check.

DESTINATION.CONFLICT_NAME: Endpoint name or URL already exists.
DESTINATION.CANNOT_EDIT: Endpoint cannot be changed while the replication rule is enabled.
DESTINATION.FAILED_TO_DELETE_TARGET_IN_USED: Failed to delete the endpoint in use.

RESET_PWD.TITLE: Reset Password
RESET_PWD.CAPTION: Enter your email to reset your password
RESET_PWD.SUCCESS: Mail with password resetting link is successfully sent. You can close this dialog and check your mailbox.
RESET_PWD.RESET_OK: Password has been successfully reset. Click OK to login with new password.

CONFIG.TITLE: Configuration
CONFIG.CONFIRM_SUMMARY: Some changes have not been saved. Do you want to discard them?
CONFIG.SSL_TOOLTIP: Enable SSL for email server connection

TOOLTIP.VERIFY_REMOTE_CERT: Determine whether the image replication should verify the certificate of a remote Harbor registry. Uncheck this box when the remote registry uses a self-signed or untrusted certificate.
TOOLTIP.AUTH_MODE: By default the authentication mode is database, i.e. the credentials are stored in a local database. Set it to LDAP if you want to verify a user's credential against an LDAP server.
TOOLTIP.LDAP_SEARCH_DN: A user's DN who has the permission to search the LDAP/AD server. If your LDAP/AD server does not support anonymous search, you should configure this DN and ldap_search_pwd.
TOOLTIP.LDAP_BASE_DN: The base DN from which to look up a user in LDAP/AD.
TOOLTIP.LDAP_UID: The attribute used in a search to match a user. It could be uid, cn, email, sAMAccountName or other attributes depending on your LDAP/AD.
TOOLTIP.LDAP_SCOPE: The scope to search for users
TOOLTIP.TOKEN_EXPIRATION: The expiration time (in minutes) of a token created by the token service. Default is 30 minutes.
TOOLTIP.PRO_CREATION_RESTRICTION: The flag to define what users have permission to create projects. By default, everyone can create a project. Set to 'Admin Only' so that only an administrator can create a project.

CONFIG.TEST_MAIL_SUCCESS: Connection to mail server is verified.
CONFIG.TEST_LDAP_SUCCESS: Connection to LDAP server is verified.
CONFIG.TEST_MAIL_FAILED: Failed to verify mail server with error: {{param}}.
CONFIG.TEST_LDAP_FAILED: Failed to verify LDAP server with error: {{param}}.
CONFIG.LEAVING_CONFIRMATION_SUMMARY: Changes have not been saved yet. Do you want to leave current page?

UNKNOWN_ERROR: Unknown errors have occurred. Please try again later.
UNAUTHORIZED_ERROR: Your session is invalid or has expired. You need to sign in to continue your action.
FORBIDDEN_ERROR: You do not have the proper privileges to perform the action.
GENERAL_ERROR: Errors have occurred when performing service call: {{param}}.
BAD_REQUEST_ERROR: We are unable to perform your action because of a bad request.
NOT_FOUND_ERROR: Your request cannot be completed because the object does not exist.
CONFLICT_ERROR: We are unable to perform your action because your submission has conflicts.
PRECONDITION_FAILED: We are unable to perform your action because of a precondition failure.
SERVER_ERROR: We are unable to perform your action because internal server errors have occurred.
